## Example

<p><strong>strong</strong></p>

### HTML

```html
<strong>...</strong>
```

### CSS

```scss
--strong-font-family: inherit;
--strong-font-weight: var(--font-weight-semibold);
--strong-font-style: inherit;
--strong-color: inherit;
```
